title: Collaborative Learning and Social-Emotional Education Strategies to Enhance Teacher Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and basic pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of collaborative learning activities using digital devices and workshops for developing socio-emotional competencies

learning_goals: A plan to enhance teacher motivation can be designed using cooperative learning techniques
Instructional strategies incorporating socioemotional learning elements can be developed
Practical guidelines for establishing a supportive school environment can be provided
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
